import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Layout from "../components/partials/layout"; import BarChart from "../components/chart/bar"; import DoughnutChart from "../components/chart/donghnut"; const Building = (props) => { const { buildingId } = useParams(); const Cesium = window.Cesium; useEffect(() => { // Supermap const viewer = new Cesium.Viewer('cesiumContainer') }, []); return (

 ) } export default Building;
